title: Oral report on a Chinese city

content.question: Directions: In this task, you will be asked to write in Chinese for a specific purpose and to a specific person. You should write in as complete and culturally appropriate a manner as possible, taking into account the purpose and the person described. Read this e-mail from a friend and then write a response. 發件人 小青 郵件主題: 城市介紹 中文課老師讓我們做個口語報告，介紹一個中國城市。我剛剛開始準備，想來想去，不知道介紹哪個城市好。我可以介紹像北京、上海這樣的大城市，也可以介紹比較小的城市，你有什麼建議？另外，為了把這個口語報告做好，我應該怎麼準備呢？等你的回信。
